entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Burns Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:11 a.m. PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
